what_am_i_looking_at.title: He aha tēnei e titiro nei au?
what_am_i_looking_at.description: Kei te titiro koe ki tētahi karere haumaru i tuari ki a koe mā OneTime Secret. Ka whakaatuhia tēnei ihirangi kotahi anake ka mutu ka mukua pūmautia mai i ā mātou tūmau.

can_i_view_again.title: Ka taea e au te tiro anō i tēnei karere huna ā muri ake?
can_i_view_again.description: Kāore. Mō ngā take haumaru, ka kitea tēnei karere huna kotahi anake. Whai muri i te kati i tēnei whārangi, ka mukua pūmautia te ihirangi, ā, kāore e taea te whakahoki e tētahi, tae atu ki a mātou.

how_to_copy.title: Me pēhea tāku tiaki i tēnei mōhiohio?
how_to_copy.description: Whakamahia te pātene 'Tārua ki te Papatopenga' ki te tārua i te karere huna katoa. Mō ngā karere huna roa ake, me whakaū kua tāruahia e koe te ihirangi katoa i mua i te wehe i tēnei whārangi.

is_my_viewing_tracked.title: Kei te aroturukihia taku tirohanga o tēnei karere huna?
is_my_viewing_tracked.description: Ka whakamōhiotia te kaituku kua tirohia tā rātou karere huna, engari kāore mātou e aroturuki ko wai i tiro, mai i hea rānei. Ka tiakina tō matatapu.

secret_view_faq.one_time_warning: Ka wehe ana koe, ka tāmata anō rānei i tēnei whārangi, ka mukua pūmautia tēnei karere huna, ā, kāore e taea te whakahoki e tētahi.

COMMON.generate_password_disabled: Kua monokia te Waihanga Kupuhipa i te wā e tika ana te puka
COMMON.custom_domains_description: Whakapakari i ngā hononga me te hanga i te whakawhirinaki me ō ake hononga karere huna waitohu.
COMMON.description: Puritia ngā mōhiohio tairongo kei roto i ō kōrerorero me te īmēra. Tuari i tētahi hononga karere huna e wātea ana kotahi anake te wā.
COMMON.keywords: karere huna,waihanga kupuhipa,tuari i tētahi karere huna,onetime
COMMON.secret_passphrase_hint: He kupu, rerenga kupu rānei e uaua ana te mātai
COMMON.secret_placeholder: Ka noho te ihirangi karere huna ki konei...
COMMON.burn_this_secret_hint: Ko te whakawareware i tētahi karere huna ka muku i mua i te pānuitanga (pāwhiri ki te whakaū)
COMMON.burn_this_secret_confirm_hint: He pūmau te whakawareware i tētahi karere huna, kāore e taea te whakakore
COMMON.click_to_verify: Haere tonu ki te whakaū i tō pūkete:
COMMON.error_secret: Kāore koe i whakarato i tētahi mea hei tuari
COMMON.error_passphrase: Matuatua anō i taua kupu karapa
COMMON.enter_passphrase_here: Tāurua te kupu karapa ki konei
COMMON.careful_only_see_once: Kia tūpato: ka whakaatu noa mātou i tēnei kotahi anake.
COMMON.feedback_text: Tuari i ō whakaaro, ariā, wheako rānei...
COMMON.burn_this_secret_aria: Whakawarewaretia tēnei karere huna mō ake tonu
COMMON.burn_confirmation_message: E tino hiahia ana koe ki te whakawareware i tēnei karere huna? Kāore tēnei mahi e taea te whakakore.
COMMON.burn_security_notice: Ka mukua te karere huna i te whakawarewaretanga i mua i te taenga.
COMMON.share_link_securely: Mō te haumaru, tuari i tēnei hononga motuhake i ētahi atu taipitopito.
COMMON.verification_not_valid: Kāore te manatoko i te whaimana
COMMON.verification_already_logged_in: Kāore e taea te whakaū i tētahi pūkete ina kua takiuru kē koe

LABELS.no_passphrase: Kāore he Kupu Karapa e Hiahiatia
LABELS.passphrase_protected: Kua tiakina ki te kupu karapa
LABELS.caption_recent_secrets: Ngā hononga karere huna i hangaia i tēnei wāhanga

STATUS.new_description: Kua hangaia te hononga karere huna, kāore anō kia tirohia
STATUS.unread_description: Kua hangaia te hononga karere huna, kāore anō kia tirohia
STATUS.viewed_description: Kua huaki te hononga karere huna, ā, kua reri ki te tirohia
STATUS.received_description: Kua kitea te karere huna ki te kaiwhiwhi
STATUS.burned_description: I whakawarewaretia ā-ringa te karere huna i mua i te tirohanga
STATUS.destroyed_description: Kua whakangaromia pūmautia te karere huna
STATUS.expiring_soon_description: Ka pau tata te karere huna
STATUS.orphaned_description: Kua pōpuku te karere huna, ā, ka whakangaromia tata
STATUS.expired_description: Kua pau te karere huna i mua i te tirohanga

FEATURES.encrypted_in_transit: Muhumuhu i te wā kawe, i te wā ata

time.second: hēkona e toe ana | ngā hēkona e toe ana

INSTRUCTION.share_passphrase_instruction: Tuaria te kupu karapa motuhake mā tētahi hongere haumaru
INSTRUCTION.secure_channel_instruction: Whakamahia tētahi hongere haumaru rerekē ki te tuari i ngā mōhiohio tairongo

ARIA.focus-is-now-in-the-main-text-area: Kei te wāhi tuhituhi matua te arotahi ināianei

homepage.tagline1: Whakapiri he kupuhipa, karere huna, hononga tūmataiti rānei ki raro.
homepage.tagline2: Puritia ngā mōhiohio tairongo kei waho i tō īmēra me ō rārangi kōrerorero.
homepage.secret_hint: * Ka mahi kotahi noa te hononga karere huna, kātahi ka ngaro mō ake tonu atu.
homepage.secret_form_more_text3: ā, ka taea te tuku i te karere huna mā te īmēra.
homepage.cta_title: Whakanui i te whakawhirinaki me te tuari i te māia
homepage.cta_subtitle: Whakapiki i tō waitohu me te tuari i te māia
homepage.cta_feature3: Whakapiki i te whakawhirinaki me te whai wāhi o ngā kiritaki
homepage.need_free_account: Kātahi anō ka tīmata? Tukua ngā īmēra ki tētahi pūkete koreutu.
homepage.visit-onetime-secret-home: Toro ki te whārangi matua o Onetime Secret
homepage.password_generation_description: Pāwhiri "Waihanga Kupuhipa" hei hanga i tētahi kupuhipa matapōkere haumaru ka taea e koe te tuari.
homepage.protip1: Ka whakangaromia-anō tō karere whai muri i te tirohanga. Ka taea te uru ki te hononga kotahi anake te wā.

private.this_msg_is_encrypted: Kua muhumuhua tēnei karere ki tō kupu karapa.
private.only_see_once: Kia tūpato: ka kitea tēnei kotahi anake.
private.created_success: Kua hangaia angitutia te karere huna!
private.created_success_key: Kua hangaia angitutia te karere huna {shortKey}!
private.created_securely: Kua hangaia haumaru tō karere huna
private.have-more-questions-visit-our: He pātai anō? Toro ki tā mātou
private.the-burn-feature-lets-you-permanently-de: Ko te āhuatanga whakawareware ka tuku i a koe ki te muku pūmau i tētahi karere huna i mua i te tirohanga o tētahi. He mea whai hua tēnei mēnā me whakakore te urunga, i tuari rānei i ngā mōhiohio hē. Ina whakawarekia, kāore e taea te whakahoki i te karere huna.
private.your-secret-will-remain-available-for-re: Ka noho wātea tonu tō karere huna mō {0}, tae noa rānei ki te wā ka tirohia, ko tēhea e tae tuatahi ana. Whai muri i te tutuki o tētahi o ngā āhuatanga, ka mukua pūmautia te karere huna.
private.how-does-secret-expiration-work: Me pēhea te mahi o te paunga karere huna?
private.for-security-reasons-we-cant-recover-los: Mō ngā take haumaru, kāore e taea e mātou te whakahoki mai i ngā hononga karere huna ngaro. Me waihanga e koe he karere huna hou, me hanga hoki he hononga hou. Ka tūtohu mātou kia tāruahia te hononga i te wā tonu i muri i te hanganga.
private.lost-your-secret-link: Kua ngaro tō hononga karere huna?
private.we-display-the-value-for-you-so-that-you: Ka whakaatu mātou i te uara ki a koe kia taea ai e koe te whakaū engari ka mahia kotahi tēnā, nō reira ki te whiwhi tētahi i tēnei whārangi tūmataiti (i tō hītori pūtirotiro, mehemea rānei ka tuku matapokorere koe i te hononga tūmataiti kaua ko te hononga karere huna), kāore rātou e kite i te uara karere huna.
private.why-can-i-only-see-the-secret-value-once: He aha ka kitea kotahi noa e au te uara karere huna?
private.burning-a-secret-permanently-deletes-it-: Ko te whakawareware i tētahi karere huna ka muku pūmau i mua i te pānuitanga o tētahi. Ka kite te kaiwhiwhi i tētahi karere e tohu ana kāore te karere huna i te tīari. He mea whai hua tēnei mēnā ka tuari pohewa koe i ngā mōhiohio hē, me ārai rānei te urunga.
private.what-happens-when-i-burn-a-secret: He aha ka puta ina whakawaretia e au tētahi karere huna?
private.and-never-stored-in-its-original-form-th: ā, kāore i te rokiroki i tōna āhua taketake. Ko tēnei huarahi ko tō tikanga kāore e taea e mātou te uru, te whakahoki rānei i tō karere huna - ko te tangata anake me te kupu karapa tika ka taea.
private.each-secret-can-only-be-viewed-once-afte: Ka taea te tiro kotahi noa ia karere huna. Whai muri i te tirohanga, ka mukua pūmautia mai i ā mātou tūmau. Ka whakaū tēnei kāore e kitea pokerehia ō mōhiohio tairongo mā te hītori pūtirotiro, mā ngā hononga tūmataiti hē rānei.

shared.requires_passphrase: Me whai kupu karapa tēnei karere:
shared.viewed_own_secret: Kua tirohia e koe tō ake karere huna. Kāore i te wātea mō tētahi atu.
shared.you_created_this_secret: Nāu i hanga tēnei karere huna. Ki te tirohia e koe, kāore e kite te kaiwhiwhi.
shared.reply_with_secret: Whakautu ki tētahi atu karere huna
shared.pre_reveal_default: Pāwhiri te pātene ki raro hei whakaatu i tō karere haumaru.
shared.post_reveal_default: Kei raro nei tō karere haumaru.

dashboard.get-started-by-creating-your-first-secre: Tīmatahia mā te waihanga i tō karere huna tuatahi.

login.need_an_account: Me whai pūkete? Waihangahia tō pūkete i tēnei rā

signup.have_an_account: Kua whai pūkete kē? Takiuru ki tō pūkete

incoming.tagline1: Whakapiri he kupuhipa, karere huna, hononga tūmataiti rānei ki raro.
incoming.tagline2: Puritia ngā mōhiohio tairongo kei waho i tō īmēra me ō rārangi kōrerorero.
incoming.secret_hint: * Ka mahi kotahi noa te hononga karere huna, kātahi ka ngaro mō ake tonu atu.
incoming.incoming_secret_placeholder: Tāurua ngā mōhiohio katoa e hiahia ai tō māngai tautoko (hei tauira, kupuhipa pūnaha)
incoming.incoming_ticket_number_hint: Ka kitea tēnei i tō īmēra (hei tauira. 123456)

account.next_billing_date: Rā utu e whai ake nei:

feedback.when-you-submit-feedback-well-see: Ina tuku koe i te urupare, ka kite mātou:

security.thank-you-for-helping-us-keep-onetime-se: Tēnā koe mō tō āwhina ki a mātou ki te pupuri i te haumaru me te pai o Onetime Secret!
security.we-take-your-privacy-seriously-all-repor: Ka aro nui mātou ki tō matatapu. Ka noho muna ngā pūrongo katoa, ā, ka mahi tahi mātou ki a koe kia whakaū kāore ngā taipitopito o te whakaraerae e hurahia ana tae noa ki te wā kua oti te whakatikatika.
security.if-the-vulnerability-is-declined-we-will: : Mēnā ka whakakāhoretia te whakaraerae, ka whakarato mātou i tētahi whakamārama taipitopito mo te take kāore i whakaaetia.
security.if-the-vulnerability-is-accepted-we-will: : Mēnā ka whakaaetia te whakaraerae, ka mahi mātou i te whakatikatika, ā, ka whai ki te tuku i te wā tōmuri ake. Ka whakamōhiotia koe i te wā kua tukuna te whakatikatika.
security.you-can-expect-to-receive-updates-on-the: : Ka taea e koe te tūmanako ka whiwhi koe i ngā whakahōunga mō te tūnga o tō pūrongo kia kotahi i ia 7 rā tae noa ki te wā kua whakaputaina te take, kua whakaputaina rānei he whakatau.
security.we-will-conduct-an-initial-assessment-of: : Ka whakahaere mātou i tētahi aromatawai tuatahi o te whakaraerae i roto i nga 14 rā mahi.
security.you-will-receive-an-acknowledgment-of-yo: : Ka whiwhi koe i te whakaae o tō pūrongo i roto i te 5 rā mahi.
security.your-contact-information-for-follow-up-q: Ō mōhiohio whakapā mō ngā pātai whai muri.
security.steps-to-reproduce-the-issue: Ngā mahi hei whakaputa anō i te take.
security.a-detailed-description-of-the-vulnerabil: He whakaahuatanga taipitopito o te whakaraerae.
security.include-as-much-information-as-possible-: : Whakaurua ngā mōhiohio katoa e taea ana mō te whakaraerae. Me whai ēnei:
security.with-the-subject-line-vulnerability-repo: me te rārangi kaupapa "Pūrongo Whakaraerae: [He Whakaahuatanga Poto]".
security.if-you-discover-a-security-vulnerability: Mēnā ka kitea e koe he whakaraerae haumaru i roto i tēnei kaupapa, ka akiaki mātou kia pūrongo koe i te wā tōmuri. Anei te huarahi e taea ai e koe:
security.if-you-are-using-an-unsupported-version-: Mēnā kei te whakamahi koe i tētahi putanga kāore i te tautokona, ka tino tūtohu mātou kia whakahou ki tētahi o ngā putanga e tautokona ana kia taea ai e koe te whiwhi i ngā whakahōunga haumaru hou.
security.we-provide-security-updates-for-the-foll: Ka whakarato mātou i ngā whakahōunga haumaru mō ēnei putanga o tā mātou kaupapa:
security.we-take-the-security-of-this-project-ser: Ka aro nui mātou ki te haumaru o tēnei kaupapa, ā, ka mihi i ō mahi hei whakapuaki tika i ngā whakaraerae. Ka whakaatu tēnei tuhinga i tā mātou kaupapahere haumaru, ā, ka whakarato i ngā aratohu mō te pēhea te pūrongo i ngā whakaraerae.

trust_points: Kāore e taea e mātou te uru ki ō mōhiohio ahakoa mēnā hiahia mātou (ēngari kāore mātou e hiahia). Hei tauira, mēnā ka tuari koe i tētahi kupuhipa, kāore mātou e mōhio te ingoa kaiwhakamahi, te taupānga rānei mōna.

Mēnā ka whakamahi koe i tētahi kupu karapa (e wātea ana i raro i "Kōwhiringa Matatapu"), ka whakaurua tēnā ki te matua whakamuhumuhu mō te karere huna. Ka rokiroki noa mātou i tētahi hash bcrypt o te kupu karapa, kāore e taea te whakamuhumuhu i tō karere huna ina kua tiakina.
Kei te {openSourceLink} tō mātou waehere. Ka taea e koe te arotake, ka taea hoki te whakahaere i tō ake taupānga mēnā e pai ana koe.
Ka whakamahi mātou i ngā tikanga haumaru ahumahi-paerewa, tae atu ki HTTPS mō ngā hononga katoa me te whakamuhumuhu i te wā ata mō ngā raraunga rokiroki.
passphrase_points: Kāore mātou e rokiroki i te karere huna whakamuhumuhu-kore, i te kupu karapa rānei.
Kāore e taea te whakamahi te hash bcrypt ki te whakamuhumuhu i te karere huna.
Ki te kore te kupu karapa taketake, kāore e taea te whakamuhumuhu i te karere huna muhumuhu, tae atu ki a mātou.
Ko te tikanga o tēnei mēnā i takahia ā mātou tūmau, ka noho haumaru tonu tō karere huna mēnā ka noho tonu te kupu karapa kāore e mōhiotia.
faq.why_use_title: He aha te take me whakamahi au i tēnei?
faq.why_use_description: Ina tuku koe i ngā kupuhipa me ngā hononga tūmataiti ki te tangata mā te īmēra, kōrerorero rānei, he tārua o aua mōhiohio e rokiroki ana i ngā wāhi maha. Mēnā ka whakamahi koe i tētahi hononga Onetime, ka noho tonu te mōhiohio mō te tirohanga kotahi, ko te tikanga kāore e taea te pānui e tētahi atu ā muri ake. Ka taea e koe te tuku i ngā mōhiohio tairongo i runga i te huarahi haumaru, me te mōhio ka kite tētahi tangata anake. Me whakaaro pēnei mō te karere motuhake-whakakore.
faq.file_limitation_title: He aha te take kāore e taea e au te tuku whakaahua, momo kōnae kē atu rānei?
faq.file_limitation_description: Kua hoahoatia tā mātou ratonga motuhake mō ngā karere huna-tuhinga hei whakaū i te haumaru teitei me te māmā. Ko ngā kōnae, otirā ngā whakaahua, ka taea te pupuri i ngā metadata ka hurahia mōhiohio mō te kaituku, mō te kaiwhiwhi rānei me te kore e hiahia. Mā te arotahi ki te kuputuhi, ka taea e mātou te whakaū kāore he raraunga atu ka tukuna i tua atu o tāu e tāipa mārama ana. Mēnā me tuari koe i tētahi kōnae i runga i te haumaru, ka tūtohu mātou kia whakamahi i tētahi ratonga whakawhiti kōnae haumaru motuhake. Ka whakaaro pea mātou ki te tāpiri i te tautoko mō ngā kōnae ā muri ake nei mēnā he take whakamahi pai mō tēnei.
faq.text_copy_title: Engari ka taea e au te tārua i te kuputuhi karere huna. He aha te rerekētanga?
faq.text_copy_description: He tika, engari ko tāu he kuputuhi anake. Ko ngā whakaahua me ētahi atu momo kōnae ka taea te pupuri i ngā metadata me ētahi atu mōhiohio hurahanga pea mō te kaituku, mō te kaiwhiwhi rānei. Anō hoki, kia whakaū tēnei kāore he mōhiohio tūmataiti e tuarihia ana i waho atu i te kaiwhiwhi e hiahiatia ana.
faq.secret_retrieval_title: Ka taea e au te tiki i tētahi karere huna kua tuaritia kētia?
faq.secret_retrieval_description: Kāo. Ka whakaatu kotahi noa mātou i tēnei, kātahi ka muku. Whai muri i tēnā, kua ngaro mō ake tonu atu.
faq.account_difference_title: He aha te rerekētanga i waenga i te whakamahi ingoakore me te whai pūkete koreutu?
faq.account_difference_description: Ka taea e ngā kaiwhakamahi ingoakore te waihanga karere huna e ora ana mō {anonymousTtlDays} rā, ā, he rahi mōrahi o {anonymousSizeKB} KB. Ka whiwhi ngā kaipupuri pūkete koreutu i ngā painga whakawhānui: ka taea e ngā karere huna te ora mō {defaultTtlDays} rā, ā, ka taea te tae ki te {defaultSizeKB} KB te rahi. Ka whiwhi hoki ngā kaipupuri pūkete i te urunga ki ngā āhuatanga tāpiri pēnei i ngā kōwhiringa whakawareware-i-mua-i-te-pānui, ka taea e ngā kaituku te muku i ngā karere huna i mua i te taenga.
faq.law_enforcement_title: Me pēhea tā koutou whakahaere i ngā tono raraunga mai i ngā pirihimana, ētahi atu tuatoru rānei?
faq.law_enforcement_description: I hoahoa mātou i tō mātou pūnaha me te aro ki te matatapu. Kāore mātou e rokiroki i ngā karere huna whai muri i te tirohanga, ā, kāore mātou e pupuri rārangi urunga i tua atu i te iti e hiahiatia ana. Ko te tikanga o tēnei i te nuinga o te wā, kāore ō mātou raraunga hei whakarato hei whakautu ki aua tono. Mō ētahi atu taipitopito, tēnā arotake i tā mātou {privacyPolicyLink}.
faq.trust_title: He aha au e whakawhirinaki ai ki a koe?
faq.trust_description: Kua hoahoa mātou i tō mātou pūnaha me te matatapu me te haumaru hei mātāmua. Anei te take ka taea e koe te whakawhirinaki ki a mātou:
faq.passphrase_title: Me pēhea te mahi o te kōwhiringa kupu karapa?
faq.passphrase_description: Ina whakamahi koe i tētahi kupu karapa, ka muhuhia e mātou tō karere huna i runga i ā mātou tūmau me te kupu karapa e whakaratohia ana e koe. Kāore mātou e rokiroki i te kupu karapa, engari he hash bcrypt anake. Ka whakamahia tēnei hash hei whakaū i te kupu karapa ina tāurua e te kaiwhiwhi. Anei te take he haumaru tēnei:
faq.passphrase_final_note: Kia maumahara, ko te haumaru o tō karere huna ka whakawhirinaki ki te kaha o tō kupu karapa me te pēhea te haumaru o tō whakawhitiwhiti i tēnei ki te kaiwhiwhi.

intro.paragraph1: Kia ora, ko {name} au, te kaihanga o Onetime Secret. I tīmata i te tau 2012 hei huarahi māmā, haumaru ki te tuari i ngā mōhiohio tairongo kua tipu ki tua atu o ā mātou tūmanako taikaha. Neke atu i te tekau tau ā muri mai, kei te āwhina mātou i te tuari haumaru o ngā miriona karere huna ia marama, me ngā kēhi whakamahi kāore mātou i whakaaro.
intro.paragraph2: Ko te wāhanga tuatahi o te tau 2024 tā mātou wā pukumahi rawa. E mihi ana mātou kua haere tonu te tangata ki te whakamahi me te tuari i tā mātou hua mō te tekau tau neke atu. Kei te mahi mātou i ngā whakapaitanga e whakaaro ana mātou ka pai ake ai te ratonga — ka tuari mātou i ētahi atu taipitopito ā tōna wā.
intro.paragraph3: E whai ana i ō mātou pakiaka, {githubLink} i GitHub. I a mātou e whakatere ana i te horanuku hurihuri o te matatapu matihiko me te haumaru, kua whakapau kaha mātou ki te pūataata me te whakapai tonu.
intro.paragraph4: Tēnā koe mō tō whai wāhi ki tō mātou haerenga. Ki tētahi atu tekau tau o te tuari haumaru, anoano.
intro.feedback_hint: Mēnā he pātai āu, he puka urupare kei te raro o (tata) ia whārangi.
intro.signature:
Ngā mihi me te tuari harikoa,
{name}

meta.were-making-onetime-secret-available-in-: Kei te whakarato mātou i a {onetime-secret} i roto i ngā reo maha. I te mea he āhuatanga hou tēnei, ka tūtaki pea koe ki ngā hapa whakamaori, kupu whakatakoto pōrearea rānei. Ka āwhina tō urupare i a mātou ki te whakapai ake - mēnā ka kitea e koe he take, tēnā {send-feedback}
meta.translations-are-new-spotted-an-error: He hou ngā whakamaoritanga. Kua kitea he hapa? {send-feedback}
meta.we-recently-added-translations: Kātahi anō mātou ka tāpiri i ngā whakamaoritanga. Kua kitea he hapa? {send-feedback}
meta.privacy-and-security-should-be-accessibl: Me wātea te matatapu me te haumaru ki te katoa, ahakoa te reo. Kei te tāpiri mātou i ngā whakamaoritanga hei āwhina i ā mātou kaiwhakamahi me ā rātou kaiwhiwhi karere ki te mārama pai ake me pēhea te whakamahi haumaru me te uru ki ngā karere me ngā hononga haumaru. I te mea he āhuatanga hou tēnei, ka tūtaki pea koe ki ētahi hapa whakamaori, tohutohu mārama kore rānei. Hei āwhina i a mātou ki te whakapai ake i te mārama me te tika o ā mātou whakamaoritanga, otirā mō ngā ihirangi e pā ana ki te haumaru-tino, tēnā {send-feedback} mēnā ka kitea e koe he take

to-understand-the-specific-regulations-a: Ki te mārama ki ngā ture motuhake me ngā whakamarumaru e hāngai ana ki tō pūkete, tēnā
each-jurisdiction-maintains-separate-leg: Ka pupuri ia mana whakahaere i ngā tūtohutanga ture motuhake me te mana whakahaere raraunga. Ahakoa ka taea e koe te waihanga pūkete i ngā mana whakahaere maha, ka noho ture motuhake tonu me te kore tuari raraunga i waenga i ngā rohe whakahaere.

onetime-secret-is-a-secure-way-to-share-: Ko Onetime Secret te huarahi haumaru ki te tuari i ngā mōhiohio tairongo e whakangaromia-anō whai muri i te tirohanga kotahi.
before-you-open-it-heres-what-you-should: I mua i tō huaki, anei te mea me mōhio koe:

created-windowprops-cust-secrets_created: Kua hangaia {0} ngā karere huna mai i {1}.
please-enter-your-new-password-below-mak: Tāurua tō kupuhipa hou ki raro nei. Me whakaū kia 8 ngā pūāhua neke atu te roa, ā, whai wāhi ai i te whakahiato o ngā reta, tau, me ngā tohu.
enter-your-email-address-below-and-well-: Tāurua tō wāhitau īmēra ki raro nei, ā, ka tukuna e mātou ngā tohutohu kia tautuhi anō i tō kupuhipa.
remember-to-include-your-email-if-youre-: - kia maumahara ki te tāpiri i tō īmēra mēnā kāore koe i te takiuru. Ka āwhina ia whakamaoritanga i ngā tāngata maha ake ki te whakawhitiwhiti haumaru.

fork-on-github-and-submit-a-pr: Fork i GitHub me te Tuku PR
your-language-skills-can-help-expand-acc: Ka āwhina ō pūkenga reo ki te whakawhānui i te urunga ki te whakawhitiwhiti haumaru.
thanks-to-our-community-we-support-over-: Nā te āwhina a tō mātou hapori, ka tautoko mātou i ngā reo 20 neke atu i tēnei rā. Heoi, me tā mātou kaha whanaketanga tere, me whakahou tonu ngā whakamaoritanga maha kia tū. Ka pā tēnei ki te onetimesecret.com me ngā mano tāutatanga whakahaere-whaiaro puta noa i te ao.
since-2012-onetime-secret-has-provided-a: Mai i te tau 2012, kua whakarato a Onetime Secret i tētahi huarahi haumaru ki te tuari i ngā mōhiohio tairongo puta noa i te ao. Me ngā kaiwhakamahi puta noa i ngā rohe kāore te reo Pākehā i te reo matua, he mea nui ngā whakamaoritanga tika mō te whakarite i te whakawhitiwhiti haumaru ki te katoa.

oops-the-page-you-are-looking-for-doesnt: Auē! Kāore te whārangi e rapu ana koe i te tīari, kua nekehia rānei.
thanks-for-helping-onetime-secret-improv: Ngā mihi mō tō āwhina ki a Onetime Secret ki te whakapai ake. He mea nui tēnei.
weve-built-this-tool-to-help-you-share-s: Kua hangaia e mātou tēnei taputapu hei āwhina i a koe ki te tuari mōhiohio tairongo i runga i te haumaru, ā, he mea nui ō wheako ao-tūturu mō te arotahi i ā mātou mahi. Ka āwhina i a mātou ki te whakatau he aha te mahi ā muri ake nei me te pēhea te whakapai ake i te ratonga mō te katoa.
hey-there-thanks-for-stopping-by-our-fee: Tēnā koe, ngā mihi mō tō toro mai ki tā mātou whārangi urupare. Ehara tō kōrero i te mea pōwhiri noa - he mea nui.

Ka tirohia ana, ka mukua pūmautia te ihirangi mai i ā mātou tūmau hei whakaū i te noho muna. Ka āwhina tēnei huarahi ki te tiaki i ō raraunga tairongo mā te whakawhāiti i tōna whakaaturanga me te ārai i te urunga whakaaetia-kore.

information-shared-through-this-service-: Ko ngā mōhiohio i tuari mā tēnei ratonga ka taea te uru kotahi anake. Ka tirohia ana, ka mukua pūmautia te ihirangi hei whakaū i te noho muna.

this-content-is-ai-generated-based-on-th: Ko tēnei ihirangi he ai-hangaia i runga i te ihirangi o tēnei whārangi, ā, kāore i te tohu i tētahi tangata, kamupene rānei tūturu.
passwords-do-not-match: Kāore ngā kupuhipa i te ōrite
welcome-to-the-global-broadcast: Nau mai ki te Pāhō Ao-Whānui!
current-language-is-currentlocal: Huri reo. Ko te reo o nāianei ko {0}
are-you-sure-you-want-to-remove-this-dom: E tino hiahia ana koe ki te tango i tēnei rohe? Kāore e taea te whakakore tēnei mahi.
failed-to-add-domain: I rahua te tāpiri i te rohe
copy-secret-to-clipboard: Tārua karere huna ki te papatopenga
